headings.usage: Hero titles, Section headers, Feature names

rules: Overlines must be uppercase, text-xs, tracking-widest (0.2em)
Body text should have relaxed line-height (1.6)

usage_rules: Primary Action (Buttons): Use Primary color (Black in Light mode, White in Dark mode) or Accent Blue for high priority.
Borders: Subtle 1px borders to define structure (Swiss Grid).
Text: High contrast. Never use pure grey for body text, tint it slightly.

rules: Use generous negative space. 2x more than standard.
Asymmetry creates interest. Don't center everything.
Mobile-first: Stack grids to col-span-1 on mobile.

buttons.style: Sharp edges or small radius (rounded-md). No pill shapes.
buttons.interaction: Scale down slightly on click (active:scale-95). Hover: opacity-90.

cards.style: Flat, 1px border, no shadow (or very subtle).

modals.style: Backdrop blur-sm. Clean white/black modal with sharp borders.

pricing_cards.highlight: Recommended plan gets a thick border or inverted color scheme.
pricing_cards.features: List with check icons. Clear hierarchy.

motion.reveal: Staggered fade-in-up for lists. Blur-in for text.

texture.noise: Optional subtle noise overlay (opacity 0.03) for 'film' look.

images.style: Abstract, Geometric, Minimalist Architecture, High-end Office.
rules: Black and white or desaturated photos preferred.
No cheesy stock photos of people shaking hands.

landing.hero_style: Big bold typography. Left aligned. Abstract 3D/Image on right.

pricing.style: Clean cards. Toggle for Monthly/Yearly. Highlight 'Yearly' savings.

legal.style: Minimalist text layout. Max-width-prose. Clear headings.
legal.access: Modals for quick view, dedicated pages for SEO/Linking.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement Dark/Light mode toggle using 'next-themes' or similar provider.
Use the provided image URLs for specific sections.
Do not use gradients for backgrounds, use solid colors.
Ensure contrast ratios meet WCAG AA standards.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
